text: Dr. J.A. Hay House, also known as Nelson House, is a historic home located at La Grange, Lewis County, Missouri. It was built about 1854, and is a 2 1/2-story, three bay, massed plan, brick dwelling with Greek Revival style design elements. It has a 1 1/2 story frame rear ell. (includes 12 photographs from 1998-1999) It was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1999. ==References== Category:Houses on the National Register of Historic Places in Missouri Category:Greek Revival houses in Missouri Category:Houses completed in 1854 Category:Buildings and structures in Lewis County, Missouri Category:National Register of Historic Places in Lewis County, Missouri
title: Dr. J.A. Hay House
